subject: Re: New Email Signature Graphics
preview: Thanks Heath for that  Regards, Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator Tel: 1300 387 228  Did you know, our Durasafe 13mm Compact Laminate is not only antibacterial and antifungal, it's also now antivira

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath for that

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Did you know, our Durasafe 13mm Compact Laminate is not only antibacterial and antifungal, it's also now antiviral? Find out exactly how.

Hello Heath,

Sorry to do this but could we please have the attached graphic again without the PROUDLY AUSTRALIAN text - just make the We're family... text below it a bit bolder to stand out, without the header PROUDLY AUSTRALIAN above it?

Thanks

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Did you know, our Durasafe 13mm Compact Laminate is not only antibacterial and antifungal, it's also now antiviral? Find out exactly how.

Thanks Heath

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Thanks Heath. Sorry final changes, just because we might as well get it right.

1. Keep the blue section at the top the same height, but for the blue&green banner at the bottom, please bring this up a bit, so it's not as wide/high, and in turn makes the whole email footer squatter/shorter.
2. Get rid of the Made in Australia badge, we have to be careful saying this, as our board is made overseas but the whole manufacturing process is done locally, but it's quite technical so no point stepping in the mud...
3. Replace the Made in Australia badge with the 'hand under the Australia' image you used on the previous version, and delete the Australia icon to the right of the Proudly Australian text.

Hopefully that then is all we'll need to do.

Thanks, and just ring me if this doesnt make sense.

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Hi Stella, 

Ok sure, no probs, hopefully this one hits the mark, let me know?

Thanks Heath, sorry Im still not loving it. Can we try something like the attached? Just need some interest at the bottom, and we also dont need the DURASAFE COMPACT LAMINATE text - it doesnt make sense on its own anyhow.

Or if you've got another option, send it through! Thanks.

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Hi Stella, 

Ok sure, please see attached.

Sorry also with this, maybe some colour somewhere on it? Could the icon or the PROUDLY AUSTRALIAN be green or something similar to the previous anti virus version, the colour looks good.

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Duracube

Thanks Heath, could we please run with the proudly Australian one, but change as per below?

Then will be needing it in a jpeg please. Thanks

PROUDLY AUSTRALIAN
We're family. Owned, operated and manufacturing here in Australia.

Also replace the anti virus text with an icon of Australia (something to break up all the text), or is there an icon of Australia with hands cupped around it or something to symbolise Australia and embracing?! No probs if not or if it looks wrong, can just use Australia icon.

Thanks.

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Duracube

Hi Stella, 

Hope you have had a good week and thanks for your patience with this task. Please see attached and let me know what you think?

@heath done updating email signature, please check
https://www.dropbox.com/sh/wgdzmd0hxyk5ccx/AAAnMTvI1vGIKyb2Qu7F3A1ua?dl=0

@jaime can you please have a go at the below. 

The original file is here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/zx6awvdw5h9jhfe/duracube-email-signature-oct-2020-version2.ai?dl=0

Thanks

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath,

Could we please have 2 new email signature graphics done up, as per below?

1. Use the same base as what we've currently got below, but change the addresses to list like this:

Sydney Head Office - Emu Plains NSW
Melbourne Office - Melbourne CBD VIC
Brisbane Office - Spring Hill QLD
Adelaide Office - Walkerville SA

See how that looks?

2. Leave one of the graphics with the existing antibac, antifungal, antivirus, and for the other one, please replace this text and the icons with:

PROUDLY AUSTRALIAN. Owned, operated and manufacturing here in Australia.

3. And lastly for both of the above, could the new email signature graphics please be a bit longer and squatter (bit more rectangular) not so short and stubby? LMK if this doesnt make sense.

Thanks!

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Marketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228
